azureLogAnalytics.query:
customEvents
| where name == "monitoredentities.report"
| where customDimensions["DeveloperMode"] != true
| where timestamp < endofday(ago(1d))
| summarize arg_max(timestamp, numPostgresInstances=toint(customDimensions["postgresInstances"])) by user_Id, bin(timestamp, 1d)
| where numPostgresInstances > 0
| summarize
    total_postgres_instances=sum(numPostgresInstances),
    base_monitor_count=dcount(user_Id)
    by bin(timestamp, 1d)
//| render timechart

panels.title: Number of monitored PostgreSQL instances and base monitors with a PostgreSQL instance

azureLogAnalytics.query:
customEvents
| where name == "monitoredentities.report"
| where customDimensions["DeveloperMode"] != true
| where timestamp < endofday(ago(1d))
| summarize arg_max(timestamp, numPostgresInstances=toint(customDimensions["postgresInstances"])) by user_Id, bin(timestamp, 1d)
| where numPostgresInstances > 0
| summarize
    sum(numPostgresInstances)//,
//    base_monitor_count=dcount(user_Id)
    by day=bin(timestamp, 1d)
| order by day
//| render timechart

let mappings = customEvents
  | where name == 'monitorinstallation.identifiers'
  | where customDimensions !has 'DeveloperMode'
  | where parse_version(application_Version) > parse_version("13.0.15.0")
  | where toint(customDimensions["baseMonitorIdentifiers.length"]) > 0 
        and tostring(customDimensions['baseMonitorIdentifiers']) != ""
  | extend bmIdList = split(customDimensions["baseMonitorIdentifiers"], ",")
  | mv-expand bmIdList 
  | project webId = user_Id, bmId = tostring(bmIdList)
  | distinct webId, bmId;
customEvents
| where name == "monitoredentities.report"
| where customDimensions !has "DeveloperMode"
| where timestamp < startofday(now())
| where timestamp > endofday(todatetime("${__from:date}"))
| extend postgresLicenses = toint(customDimensions["licensedPostgresEnvironments"])
| where postgresLicenses > 0
| join kind=inner mappings on $left.user_Id == $right.bmId
| summarize instanceCount = sum(postgresLicenses), customerCount = dcount(webId) by bin(timestamp, 1d)
| extend avgInstancesPerCustomer = todouble(instanceCount)/customerCount
| project timestamp, avgInstancesPerCustomer
| render timechart

let mappings = customEvents
  | where name == 'monitorinstallation.identifiers'
  | where customDimensions !has 'DeveloperMode'
  | where parse_version( application_Version) > parse_version("13.0.15.0")
  // the 'baseMonitorIdentifiers' field was added in 13.0.15
  // we could look for earlier versions, but we'd need to build the bmIdList using a range 
  // e.g. | extend bmIdList = range(0, toint(customDimensions["baseMonitorIdentifiers.length"]-1),1)
  // we can also check this for belt-and-braces: tostring(customDimensions['baseMonitorIdentifiers'])!=""
  | where toint(customDimensions["baseMonitorIdentifiers.length"]) > 0 and tostring(customDimensions['baseMonitorIdentifiers'])!=""
  | extend bmIdList = split(customDimensions["baseMonitorIdentifiers"],",")
  | mv-expand bmIdList 
  | project webId = user_Id, bmId = tostring(bmIdList)
  | distinct webId, bmId;
customEvents
| where name == "monitoredentities.report"
| where customDimensions !has "DeveloperMode"
| where timestamp < startofday(now())
| where timestamp > endofday(todatetime("${__from:date}"))
| where customDimensions["licensedPostgresEnvironments"]>0
| join kind=inner mappings on $left.user_Id==$right.bmId
| summarize dcount(webId) by bin(timestamp, 1d)

panels.title: Installations with at least one licensed Postgres entity

panels.description: Count of installations (websites) which are monitoring at least 10 Postgres instances, and more Postgres than SQL Server.

azureLogAnalytics.query:
// number of installs with majority postgres
let mappings = customEvents
  | where name == 'monitorinstallation.identifiers'
  | where customDimensions !has 'DeveloperMode'
  | where parse_version( application_Version) > parse_version("13.0.15.0")
  // the 'baseMonitorIdentifiers' field was added in 13.0.15
  // we could look for earlier versions, but we'd need to build the bmIdList using a range 
  // e.g. | extend bmIdList = range(0, toint(customDimensions["baseMonitorIdentifiers.length"]-1),1)
  // we can also check this for belt-and-braces: tostring(customDimensions['baseMonitorIdentifiers'])!=""
  | where toint(customDimensions["baseMonitorIdentifiers.length"]) > 0 and tostring(customDimensions['baseMonitorIdentifiers'])!=""
  | extend bmIdList = split(customDimensions["baseMonitorIdentifiers"],",")
  | mv-expand bmIdList 
  | project webId = user_Id, bmId = tostring(bmIdList)
  | distinct webId, bmId;
customEvents
| where name == "monitoredentities.report"
| where customDimensions !has "DeveloperMode"
| where timestamp<startofday(now())
| extend postgres=toint(customDimensions["postgresInstances"])
| extend sqlCount=toint(customDimensions["sqlServers"])
| where postgres>9
| summarize arg_max(timestamp, *) by user_Id, day=bin(timestamp, 1d)
| join kind=inner mappings on $left.user_Id==$right.bmId
| summarize totalPg = sum(postgres), totalSql=sum(sqlCount) by webId, day
| extend fractionPg = iff(totalSql==0, 1.0, todouble(totalPg)/todouble(totalPg+totalSql))
| where fractionPg > 0.5
| summarize count() by day
| order by day asc
//| order by fractionPg desc

panels.title: Installations with majority PostgreSQL Entities

panels.description: Count of total views, and distinct WebServers, viewing DatabaseOverview page for PostgreSQL

azureLogAnalytics.query:
customEvents
| where name == "serveroverview.databaseoverview.viewed"
| where customDimensions !has "DeveloperMode"
| extend serverType = tostring(customDimensions["serverType"])
| where serverType == "PostgresServer"
| where timestamp >= ago(30d) 
| summarize EventCountPerUser=count() by bin(timestamp, 1d), user_Id
| summarize WebServerCount=dcount(user_Id), EventCount=sum(EventCountPerUser) by bin(timestamp, 1d)
| project timestamp, EventCount, WebServerCount
| order by timestamp asc

panels.title: Database Overview Views

azureLogAnalytics.query:
customEvents
  | where name == "monitoredentities.report"
//  | where customDimensions !has "DeveloperMode" // not needed for Rg-Insights-Production
//  | where timestamp > startofday(ago(80d)) and timestamp < endofday(ago(1d))
  | where timestamp<startofday(now()) // only include full days worth of data
  | extend day=bin(timestamp, 1d)
  | summarize arg_max(timestamp, *) by user_Id, day
//   | extend totalServers = toint(customDimensions["sqlServers"])+toint(customDimensions["sqlServerInstances"])
  | extend totalServers = toint(customDimensions["postgresInstances"])
  | where totalServers > 0
  | summarize median=percentile(totalServers,50)
  , mean=avg(totalServers)
  , decile9=percentile(totalServers,90)
  by day

panels.description: Data from last 30 days by default.

azureLogAnalytics.query:
customEvents
| where name in ("serveroverview.databasesoverview.indexdetails.sentiment"
,"serveroverview.databasesoverview.tabledetails.sentiment"
,"serveroverview.databasesoverview.databasedetails.sentiment")
| where customDimensions !has "DeveloperMode"
| extend Sentiment = tostring(customDimensions.Sentiment)
| extend DisplaySentiment = case(
    Sentiment == "up", "Positive",
    Sentiment == "down", "Negative",
    Sentiment
)
| summarize count() by DisplaySentiment

panels.title: Index, DB & table page sentiment

panels.description: Of those base monitors which have the feature, how many have enabled it. (Last 3 days including today)

azureLogAnalytics.query:
customEvents
| where name == "indexusagesampling.postgres.report"
| where customDimensions !has "DeveloperMode"
| where timestamp > ago(3d)
| extend totalServers = toint(customDimensions["totalServerCount"]), enabledServers=toint(customDimensions["samplingEnabledServerCount"])
| where totalServers >0
| extend someEnabledServer=(enabledServers>0)
| extend hasEnabledIndexes = iff(someEnabledServer, "Enabled", "Not Enabled")
| summarize arg_max(timestamp, *) by user_Id
| project hasEnabledIndexes, enabledServers
| summarize count() by hasEnabledIndexes

panels.title: Base Monitors with Index Monitoring

panels.description: Of those base monitors which have the feature, how many distinct installations have enabled it, each day (ending yesterday to ensure full days worth of data)

azureLogAnalytics.query:
customEvents
| where name == "indexusagesampling.postgres.report"
| where customDimensions !has "DeveloperMode"
| extend totalServers = toint(customDimensions["totalServerCount"]), enabledServers=toint(customDimensions["samplingEnabledServerCount"])
| where totalServers >0
| where timestamp < startofday(now())
| extend someEnabledServer=(enabledServers>0)
| extend hasEnabledIndexes = iff(someEnabledServer, "Enabled", "Not Enabled")
| summarize arg_max(timestamp, *) by user_Id, day=bin(timestamp, 1d)
| project hasEnabledIndexes, timestamp
| summarize count() by hasEnabledIndexes, day=bin(timestamp, 1d)
| order by day asc

panels.title: Base Monitors with Index Monitoring

panels.description: Data from last 30 days by default.

azureLogAnalytics.query:
customEvents
| where name in ("serveroverview.databasesoverview.indexdetails.sentiment"
,"serveroverview.databasesoverview.tabledetails.sentiment"
,"serveroverview.databasesoverview.databasedetails.sentiment")
| where customDimensions !has "DeveloperMode"
| extend Sentiment = tostring(customDimensions.Sentiment)
| extend PageName = case(
    name == "serveroverview.databasesoverview.indexdetails.sentiment", "Index Details",
    name == "serveroverview.databasesoverview.tabledetails.sentiment", "Table Details",
    name == "serveroverview.databasesoverview.databasedetails.sentiment", "Database Details",
    name
)
| extend DisplaySentiment = case(
    Sentiment == "up", "Positive",
    Sentiment == "down", "Negative",
    Sentiment
)
| summarize count() by PageName, DisplaySentiment

panels.title: Index, table, & DB sentiment by page

panels.description: Count of all clicks, per day, on various parts of the database, table and index details pages

azureLogAnalytics.query:
let database = customEvents
    | where name == "serveroverview.databasesoverview.database.clicked"
    | where customDimensions !has "DeveloperMode"
    | where customDimensions["engine"] == "PostgresDatabase"
    | summarize Clicks=count() by bin(timestamp, 1d)
    | extend type = "Database";
let table = customEvents
    | where name == "serveroverview.databasesoverview.databasedetails.table.clicked"
    | where customDimensions !has "DeveloperMode"
    | where customDimensions["engine"] == "PostgresDatabase"
    | summarize Clicks=count() by bin(timestamp, 1d)
    | extend type = "Table";
let index = customEvents
    | where name == "serveroverview.databasesoverview.tabledetails.index.clicked"
    | where customDimensions !has "DeveloperMode"
    | where customDimensions["engine"] == "PostgresDatabase"
    | summarize Clicks=count() by bin(timestamp, 1d)
    | extend type = "Index";
let dbsBreadcrumb = customEvents
    | where name == "serveroverview.databasesoverview.breadcrumb.clicked"
    | where customDimensions !has "DeveloperMode"
    | where customDimensions["engine"] == "PostgresDatabase"
    | summarize Clicks=count() by bin(timestamp, 1d)
    | extend type = "DatabasesBreadcrumb";
let dbDetailsBreadcrumb = customEvents
    | where name == "serveroverview.databasesoverview.databasedetails.breadcrumb.clicked"
    | where customDimensions !has "DeveloperMode"
    | where customDimensions["engine"] == "PostgresDatabase"
    | summarize Clicks=count() by bin(timestamp, 1d)
    | extend type = "DatabaseDetailsBreadcrumb";
let tableDetailsBreadcrumb = customEvents
    | where name == "serveroverview.databasesoverview.tabledetails.breadcrumb.clicked"
    | where customDimensions !has "DeveloperMode"
    | where customDimensions["engine"] == "PostgresDatabase"
    | summarize Clicks=count() by bin(timestamp, 1d)
    | extend type = "TableDetailsBreadcrumb";
database
| union table
| union index
| union dbsBreadcrumb
| union dbDetailsBreadcrumb
| union tableDetailsBreadcrumb
| where timestamp < startofday(now())
| summarize Clicks = sum(Clicks) by bin(timestamp, 1d), type
| order by timestamp asc

panels.title: Postgres overview clicks by object type

panels.description: Count of all distinct installs, per day, on various parts of the database, table and index details pages ("user" = "website id")

azureLogAnalytics.query:
let database = customEvents
    | where name == "serveroverview.databasesoverview.database.clicked"
    | where customDimensions !has "DeveloperMode"
    | where customDimensions["engine"] == "PostgresDatabase"
    | summarize Clicks=dcount(user_Id) by bin(timestamp, 1d)
    | extend type = "Database";
let table = customEvents
    | where name == "serveroverview.databasesoverview.databasedetails.table.clicked"
    | where customDimensions !has "DeveloperMode"
    | where customDimensions["engine"] == "PostgresDatabase"
    | summarize Clicks=dcount(user_Id) by bin(timestamp, 1d)
    | extend type = "Table";
let index = customEvents
    | where name == "serveroverview.databasesoverview.tabledetails.index.clicked"
    | where customDimensions !has "DeveloperMode"
    | where customDimensions["engine"] == "PostgresDatabase"
    | summarize Clicks=dcount(user_Id) by bin(timestamp, 1d)
    | extend type = "Index";
let dbsBreadcrumb = customEvents
    | where name == "serveroverview.databasesoverview.breadcrumb.clicked"
    | where customDimensions !has "DeveloperMode"
    | where customDimensions["engine"] == "PostgresDatabase"
    | summarize Clicks=dcount(user_Id) by bin(timestamp, 1d)
    | extend type = "DatabasesBreadcrumb";
let dbDetailsBreadcrumb = customEvents
    | where name == "serveroverview.databasesoverview.databasedetails.breadcrumb.clicked"
    | where customDimensions !has "DeveloperMode"
    | where customDimensions["engine"] == "PostgresDatabase"
    | summarize Clicks=dcount(user_Id) by bin(timestamp, 1d)
    | extend type = "DatabaseDetailsBreadcrumb";
let tableDetailsBreadcrumb = customEvents
    | where name == "serveroverview.databasesoverview.tabledetails.breadcrumb.clicked"
    | where customDimensions !has "DeveloperMode"
    | where customDimensions["engine"] == "PostgresDatabase"
    | summarize Clicks=dcount(user_Id) by bin(timestamp, 1d)
    | extend type = "TableDetailsBreadcrumb";
database
| union table
| union index
| union dbsBreadcrumb
| union dbDetailsBreadcrumb
| union tableDetailsBreadcrumb
| where timestamp < startofday(now())
| summarize Clicks = sum(Clicks) by bin(timestamp, 1d), type
| order by timestamp asc

panels.title: Postgres overview distinct installs by object type

panels.description: Something seems wonky with this display? Why isn't 11.0 showing on most columns?!?

azureLogAnalytics.query:
customEvents
| where customDimensions["DeveloperMode"] != true
| where name == "monitoredentities.versions"
| where customDimensions['entityType'] == 'PostgresInstance'
| where timestamp < endofday( ago(1d) )
| extend major = tostring(split(application_Version, ".")[0])
| extend minor = tostring(split(application_Version, ".")[1])
| extend build = tostring(split(application_Version, ".")[2])
| extend minorX = case(strlen(minor) == 1, strcat("0", minor), minor)
| extend buildX = case(strlen(build) == 1, strcat("0", build), build)
| extend majorMinor = strcat(major, ".", minorX, ".", buildX)
| extend ver = case(major==11, "11.x",
                    major==12, "12.x",
                    (major==13 and toint(build)<=40), "13.00.40 or lower",
                    major==13, "13.00.41 or higher",
                    (major==14 and toint(build)<=10), "14.00.10 or lower",
                    (major==14 and toint(build)<=39), "14.00.39 or lower",
                    majorMinor)
| summarize sessions=dcount(session_Id) by day=bin(timestamp, 1d), ver 
| order by day asc
// | order by ver desc
//| render stackedArea

insightsAnalytics.query:
customEvents
| where customDimensions["DeveloperMode"] != true
| extend major = tostring(split(application_Version, ".")[0])
| extend minor = tostring(split(application_Version, ".")[1])
| extend build = tostring(split(application_Version, ".")[2])
| extend minorX = case(strlen(minor) == 1, strcat("0", minor), minor)
| extend buildX = case(strlen(build) == 1, strcat("0", build), build)
| extend majorMinor = strcat(major, ".", minorX, ".", buildX)
| extend ver = case(major==13, majorMinor,
                    major==12, "v12",
                    "v11 and lower")
| summarize sessions=dcount(session_Id) by bin(timestamp, 1d), ver 
| order by bin(timestamp, 1d) asc, ver

panels.title: Session count by Monitor version

panels.description: Sessions for instances monitoring Postgres entities broken down by released features they have available

azureLogAnalytics.query:
customEvents
| where customDimensions["DeveloperMode"] != true
| where name == "monitoredentities.versions"
| where customDimensions['entityType'] == 'PostgresInstance'
| where timestamp < endofday(ago(1d))
| extend major = tostring(split(application_Version, ".")[0])
| extend minor = tostring(split(application_Version, ".")[1])
| extend build = tostring(split(application_Version, ".")[2])
| extend minorX = case(strlen(minor) == 1, strcat("0", minor), minor)
| extend buildX = case(strlen(build) == 1, strcat("0", build), build)
| extend majorMinor = strcat(major, ".", minorX, ".", buildX)
| extend ibuild = toint(build)
| where toint(major) > 12
| extend ver = case(
                   (major == 13 and ibuild < 10),
                   "13.0.00 PostgreSQL Linux and RDS",
                   (major == 13 and ibuild < 15),
                   "13.0.10 First alerts",
                   (major == 13 and ibuild < 27),
                   "13.0.15 Replication",
                   (major == 13 and ibuild < 35),
                   "13.0.27 Aurora",
                   (major == 13 and ibuild < 42),
                   "13.0.35 Postgres 16",
                   (major == 13 and ibuild < 43),
                   "13.0.42 Configuration",
                   (major == 13 and ibuild < 44),
                   "13.0.43 Autovacuum",
                   (major == 13 and ibuild < 53),
                   "13.0.44 Recommendations",
                   (major == 13) or (major == 14 and ibuild < 4),
                   "13.0.53 More alerts",
                   (major == 14 and ibuild < 5),
                   "14.0.04 Queryplan Changes",
                   (major == 14 and ibuild < 10),
                   "14.0.05 IAM support",
                   (major == 14 and ibuild < 27),
                   "14.0.10 Current Activity",
                   (major == 14 and ibuild < 30),
                   "14.0.27 Low cache hit ratio",
                   (major == 14 and ibuild < 32),
                   "14.0.30 Postgres 17",
                   (major == 14 and ibuild < 34),
                   "14.0.32 NFS",
                   (major == 14 and ibuild < 39),
                   "14.0.34 Azure Flex",
                   (major == 14 and ibuild < 40),
                   "14.0.39 Entra Powershell",
                   (major == 14 and ibuild < 42),
                   "14.0.40 Flex Query Plans & Entra ID",
                   (major == 14 and ibuild < 56),
                   "14.0.42 Log Entry Alerts",
                   (major == 14 and ibuild < 58),
                   "14.0.56 Indexes FUR",
                   (major == 14 and ibuild < 66),
                   "14.0.58 Databases Tab",
                   (major == 14 and ibuild < 67),
                   "14.0.66 Index Monitoring",
                   (major == 14 and ibuild < 68),"14.0.67 Index CTA and Sentiment",
                   (major == 14 and ibuild < 71), "14.0.68 Test Add Server pt1",
                   "14.0.71 Missing TQ, QP diag"
               ) 
| summarize sessions=dcount(session_Id) by bin(timestamp, 1d), ver 
| order by timestamp asc, ver

insightsAnalytics.query:
customEvents
| where customDimensions["DeveloperMode"] != true
| extend major = tostring(split(application_Version, ".")[0])
| extend minor = tostring(split(application_Version, ".")[1])
| extend build = tostring(split(application_Version, ".")[2])
| extend minorX = case(strlen(minor) == 1, strcat("0", minor), minor)
| extend buildX = case(strlen(build) == 1, strcat("0", build), build)
| extend majorMinor = strcat(major, ".", minorX, ".", buildX)
| extend ver = case(major==13, majorMinor,
                    major==12, "v12",
                    "v11 and lower")
| summarize sessions=dcount(session_Id) by bin(timestamp, 1d), ver 
| order by bin(timestamp, 1d) asc, ver

panels.title: Sessions for available Postgres Features
Base Monitor Versions with monitored Postgres entities

panels.description: And whether or not they are monitoring any PostgreSQL instances

azureLogAnalytics.query:
customEvents
| where customDimensions !has "DeveloperMode"
| where name == "monitoredentities.report"
| where timestamp > ago(7d)
| extend hasSomePostgres=case(customDimensions["postgresInstances"]>0, "SomePostgres", "NoPostgres") 
| extend major = tostring(split(application_Version, ".")[0])
| summarize arg_max(timestamp, *) by user_Id
| summarize count() by usage=strcat(hasSomePostgres, "-", major)
| order by usage

panels.title: Base Monitors by version

azureLogAnalytics.query:
let mappings = customEvents
  | where name == 'monitorinstallation.identifiers'
  | where customDimensions !has 'DeveloperMode'
  | where parse_version( application_Version) > parse_version("13.0.15.0")
  // the 'baseMonitorIdentifiers' field was added in 13.0.15
  // we could look for earlier versions, but we'd need to build the bmIdList using a range 
  // e.g. | extend bmIdList = range(0, toint(customDimensions["baseMonitorIdentifiers.length"]-1),1)
  // we can also check this for belt-and-braces: tostring(customDimensions['baseMonitorIdentifiers'])!=""
  | where toint(customDimensions["baseMonitorIdentifiers.length"]) > 0 and tostring(customDimensions['baseMonitorIdentifiers'])!=""
  | extend bmIdList = split(customDimensions["baseMonitorIdentifiers"],",")
  | mv-expand bmIdList 
  | project webId = user_Id, bmId = tostring(bmIdList)
  | distinct webId, bmId;
customEvents
| where name == "monitoredentities.report"
| where customDimensions !has "DeveloperMode"
| where timestamp < startofday(now())
| where timestamp > endofday(todatetime("${__from:date}"))
| where customDimensions["licensedPostgresEnvironments"]>0
| join kind=inner mappings on $left.user_Id==$right.bmId
| summarize dcount(webId) by day=bin(timestamp, 1d)
| order by day asc

panels.title: Installations with at least one licensed Postgres entity

azureLogAnalytics.query:
let GetMonthName = (monthofyear:int) {
    case(
        monthofyear == 1, "January",
        monthofyear == 2, "February",
        monthofyear == 3, "March",
        monthofyear == 4, "April",
        monthofyear == 5, "May",
        monthofyear == 6, "June",
        monthofyear == 7, "July",
        monthofyear == 8, "August",
        monthofyear == 9, "September",
        monthofyear == 10, "October",
        monthofyear == 11, "November",
        monthofyear == 12, "December",
        "Invalid Month" // fallback for values outside 1–12
    )
};
customEvents
| where name == "serveroverview.viewed"
| where customDimensions !has "payload.DeveloperMode"
| where customDimensions["payload.serverType"]=="PostgresServer"
//| where timestamp>startofmonth(ago(120d))
| extend monthNum = monthofyear(timestamp)
| summarize dcount(user_Id), monthNum=max(monthNum) by yearMonth=format_datetime(timestamp, "yyyy-MM")
| order by yearMonth asc
| project GetMonthName(monthNum),Users=dcount_user_Id

let GetMonthName = (monthofyear:int) {
    case(
        monthofyear == 1, "January",
        monthofyear == 2, "February",
        monthofyear == 3, "March",
        monthofyear == 4, "April",
        monthofyear == 5, "May",
        monthofyear == 6, "June",
        monthofyear == 7, "July",
        monthofyear == 8, "August",
        monthofyear == 9, "September",
        monthofyear == 10, "October",
        monthofyear == 11, "November",
        monthofyear == 12, "December",
        "Invalid Month" // fallback for values outside 1–12
    )
};
customEvents
| where name == "serveroverview.viewed"
| where customDimensions !has "payload.DeveloperMode"
| where customDimensions["payload.serverType"]=="PostgresServer"
//| where timestamp>startofmonth(ago(120d))
| extend monthNum = monthofyear(timestamp)
| summarize dcount(user_Id), monthNum=max(monthNum) by yearMonth=format_datetime(timestamp, "yyyy-MM")
| order by yearMonth desc 
| take 2
| order by yearMonth asc
| take 1
| project GetMonthName(monthNum),Users=dcount_user_Id

customEvents
| where customDimensions !has "DeveloperMode"
| where name=="monitoredentities.report"
| where customDimensions["postgresInstances"]>0
| where timestamp > ago(3d) // show only most recently seen BMs
| extend postgresInstances=toint(customDimensions["postgresInstances"])
| summarize arg_max(timestamp, *) by user_Id
| summarize BaseMonitors=count() by postgresInstances
| project postgresInstances, BaseMonitors
| order by postgresInstances asc

panels.title: Base Monitors by Monitored PG instances

azureLogAnalytics.query:
customEvents
| where name in ("serveroverview.topqueries.diagnoseresults")
| where customDimensions has "AllTestsPassed"
| summarize count(customDimensions["AllTestsPassed"] == true), count(customDimensions["AllTestsPassed"] == false)

customEvents
| where name in ("serveroverview.topqueries.diagnoseresults")
| where customDimensions has "IsPgMonitorRoleGranted"
| where customDimensions has "IsTrackingStatements"
| where customDimensions has "IsPgStatStatementsLoaded"
| where customDimensions has "IsPgStatStatementsEnabled"
| summarize count(customDimensions["IsPgMonitorRoleGranted"] == false), count(customDimensions["IsTrackingStatements"] == false), count(customDimensions["IsPgStatStatementsLoaded"] == false), count(customDimensions["IsPgStatStatementsEnabled"] == false)

customEvents
| where name in ("serveroverview.queryplans.diagnoseresults")
| where customDimensions has "AllTestsPassed"
| summarize count(customDimensions["AllTestsPassed"] == true), count(customDimensions["AllTestsPassed"] == false)

customEvents
| where name in ("serveroverview.topqueries.diagnoseresults")
| where customDimensions has "IsAutoExplainEnabled"
| where customDimensions has "IsLogLevelCorrect"
| where customDimensions has "IsLogFormatJson"
| where customDimensions has "CurrentLogMinDuration"
| where customDimensions has "CurrentSampleRate"
| summarize count(customDimensions["IsAutoExplainEnabled"] == false), count(customDimensions["IsLogLevelCorrect"] == false), count(customDimensions["IsLogFormatJson"] == false), count(customDimensions["CurrentLogMinDuration"] == 0), count(customDimensions["CurrentSampleRate"] == 0)

customEvents
| where name == "configuration.monitoredservers.test.v2"
| where user_Id =="Ozkan.Pakdil"
//| where customDimensions["DeveloperMode"] == true
| where customDimensions["entityType"] == "PostgresInstance"
| extend testResultsKeys = bag_keys(customDimensions)
| where array_length(array_slice(testResultsKeys, 0, array_length(testResultsKeys))) > 0
| mv-apply bagItem = bag_keys(customDimensions) to typeof(string) on (
    where bagItem startswith "testResults." and bagItem !contains " " and bagItem !contains "EntityTestCaseResult"
    | extend TestName = replace_string(bagItem, "testResults.", "")
    | extend Success = tobool(customDimensions[bagItem])
    | project TestName, Success
)
| where isnotempty(TestName) and isnotnull(Success)
| summarize Count = count() by TestName, Success
| evaluate pivot(Success, sum(Count))
| render columnchart by TestName
